title: Melbourne Metro Tunnel train services will soon begin – but what is the ‘summer start’ and when is the ‘big switch’?
summary: Starting in December, trains will operate every 20 minutes. However, commuters will need to wait until February 1 for the introduction of 'turn up and go' services. This change aims to enhance convenience for travelers.

title: Proof-of-age ID leaked in Discord data breach
summary: A video game chat platform has notified users that sensitive data, including driver's licenses and passports, was compromised through a third-party customer service provider. The breach raises concerns about data security and privacy. The platform is likely taking steps to address the incident and inform affected users.

title: ‘It’s Sellafield or nothing’: what life is like growing up in the shadow of Europe’s oldest nuclear site
summary: In Whitehaven, England, the local power plant is a vital source of employment and community funding for young residents. However, many youth seeking opportunities beyond the town face a lack of options. The reliance on the plant underscores a broader issue of limited prospects in the region.

title: ‘People screamed. Cried. Threw up’: 10 extraordinary life lessons from Ozzy Osbourne’s new memoir
summary: The late rock legend's book reveals his struggle with addiction, humorously detailing how he transitioned from cigarettes to smoking 30 cigars daily. He presents himself as self-aware and insightful, offering lessons on fame and the importance of choosing the right support in life's challenges. His experience serves as a candid exploration of coping with addiction and its consequences.
